cast.name: 金伯莉·斯帕克 Kimberly Spak

this_title: The Night That Didn't End Season 1
introduction: When a person is murdered, their life's story comes to an abrupt end. But for the loved ones left behind, friends and family often relive traumatic memories in vivid detail for the rest of their lives. These painful recollections can also contain clues that help detectives piece together the victim's Night That Didn't End.
foreign_title: The Night That Didn't End Season 1
